author: Simon Difford
description: Apple and honey are indeed a marriage made in heaven, especially when laced with grainy vodka notes.
name: Appily Married
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
10 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled pre-prepared glass
